summary: This document is a certification of good standing for the corporation known as Jeepers, Inc., filed with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It confirms that the corporation was incorporated in 2003 and is currently in good standing to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes is identified as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks, who issued the certification of good standing for Jeepers, Inc.

keyFacts: Jeepers, Inc. filed Articles of Incorporation on August 18, 2003.
A Certificate of Incorporation was issued on August 20, 2003.
The corporation is considered to be in good standing as of the date of this certification.
